meanings.definition: A loud, resonant sound, as of a bell.
meanings.sent1: The dong of the church bell echoed through the village.
meanings.sent2: I heard the dong of the grandfather clock every hour.
meanings.sent3: The dong of the bell made the sleepy town come alive.
meanings.sent4: The dong of the bell seemed to reach every corner of the valley.
meanings.sent5: The dong of the bell was so powerful, it could be felt in your chest.

meanings.definition: To strike or ring a bell.
meanings.sent1: I will dong the bell to signal the start of the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: She dongs the bell three times to call everyone for dinner.
meanings.sent3: He playfully dongs the bell, making everyone jump in surprise.
meanings.sent4: The wind dongs the bell softly, creating a soothing melody.
meanings.sent5: As the sun sets, the church bells dong to mark the end of the day.

meanings.definition: A slang term for the male genitalia.
meanings.sent1: He accidentally hit himself in the dong while playing sports.
meanings.sent2: The comedian joked about getting kicked in the dong during his stand-up routine.
meanings.sent3: The toddler giggled and pointed at his dad's dong in the changing room.
meanings.sent4: The boxer took a hard hit to the dong and winced in pain.
meanings.sent5: The doctor asked the patient if there was any discomfort in the dong area.
